entry.p: RFC 6963, released today, is the latest document I've had published in the RFC series. This RFC provides a way for specification authors to generate documentation examples using Uniform Resource Names (URNs), similar to domain names like "example.com" (see RFC 2606). So if you've been dying to put "urn:example:foo" in your documentation or you need to generate random URNs for testing purposes, have at it!
